content: one of my favourite insects and gardeners friend aphid enemy ladybird or ladybug how do you say it my lady has a small pebble inserted into the body so could be used as a paper-weight should the need arise and should she need a purpose if not she s fun to arrange in the house and out in the garden - ooh and i d love to see a micro knit one i ve tried myself on 0 8mm needles but failed miserably within the pattern i ve given lots of detailed instructions on how to add the wire legs - i used two x 26cm/ 10in long x 22 gauge ones - i ve also linked to en etsy shop from where i bought mine yarn-wise - i ve used stash drops alpaca but you can use any 4-ply/ 3-ply or finer if micro yarn and i knitted mine on 2mm needles i hope you enjoy this little pattern and enjoy having her around the place claire xx
